body.p:
Front and side-access PDUs (one or both sides) can have the following:
Main Cabinet with front-facing transformer.
21‚Äù front- and side-facing Side Cars, requiring 36" side service clearance if side access is used.
9" side-facing Side Car(s), requiring 36" service clearance on sides with this Side Car.
12" side-facing Side Car for I-Line panelboards.
